About.descripcion:
My name is Carlos Sebastian Fernandez, i am 21 years old and i am from Buenos Aires, Argentina.
I am a creative developer and very committed to my work. I always like to give a little more of me to exceed expectations.

Actually, i am offering web development services as a freelancer, while studying to increase my knowledge and looking for a job position to advance on my career.

At the moment, my experience as a developer its only based on projects done on my own.
However, I have work experience in other areas. Jobs where I learned how to perform tasks within a group and solve problems on my own, being prepared for any situation i could face.
